definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: The roundness of grit's projection was assessed by minimum circumcircle method.
sentences.chinese: 以最小外接圓法評定了金剛石顆粒投影的圓度。

sentences.english: It is a circle that is circumscribed around a square.
sentences.chinese: 那是一個正方形的外接圓。
